titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of February 6 through February 10, 2012, as "National School Counseling Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 1/24/2012--Introduced. Honors the contributions of school counselors to the success of students in our elementary and secondary schools. Encourages the observation of National School Counseling Week with ceremonies and activities that promote awareness of the crucial role school counselors play in preparing students for fulfilling lives as contributing members of society.
